text:
It's almost time for the joint training camp.
Are you girls worried?

There's no need to worry about now,
Just do what you always do.

That's right.
As always, I'll give my best.

Yes!
I want to have some "friendly rivalry" with the other units!

That's a good mindset.
I hope this joint training camp will be a great opportunity.

I'll do my best! / Yes! / Leave it to me / Yes.../
Yeah!
